question:
Consider the following statements about the Cell for IPR Promotion and Management (CIPAM):
  1. It is the web-portal established under the aegis of Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion (DIPP)
  2. CIPAM with the help of WIPO (World Intellectual Property Organisation) is setting up Indiaâ€™s first innovation centre in Gujarat.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. Cell for IPR Promotion and Management (CIPAM) is a web-portal established under the aegis of Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. CIPAM in collaboration with WIPO is setting up two innovation centres in India; the first being in Punjab and second in Tamil Nadu. CIPAM aims to ensure focused action on issues related to IPRs and smooth implementation of the objectives of the National IPR Policy. It aims to provide the different stakeholder with information pertaining to the Intellectual Property Rights.
